title: IT Fullstack Mid/Senior - Kinh Nghiệm Từ 3 Năm - Thu Nhập Upto 80 Triệu
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ GIẢI PHÁP SỐ BETECH
job_description:
About Us
- We're building next-generation decentralized finance tools powered by the Solana blockchain. Our mission is to empower users and developers with fast, reliable, and intelligent infrastructure for Web3.
- Role Overview We're looking for a Mid-Level Fullstack Developer to build scalable blockchain-integrated platforms. You'll work with TypeScript and Golang on both frontend and backend, collaborating closely on Solana-based applications
- Responsibilities- Develop and maintain fullstack applications (Node.js/TypeScript + Golang + modern frontend frameworks like React)- Integrate Solana blockchain features (wallets, smart contracts, transactions)- Build APIs, services, and UIs with best practices- Collaborate in a fast-paced agile environment- Write clean, testable, and well-documented code
requirements:
Requirements
- 3+ years of fullstack development experience
- Proficient in TypeScript (Node.js+React)
- Experience with Golang backend services
- Basic understanding of Solana blockchain (e.g.,solana/web3.js)- Familiarity with Git, CI/CD, Docker
Nice-to-Have
- Exposure to message queues (e.g., Kafka, BullMQ)
- Familiarity with blockchain patterns (DEX, liquidity, RPC)
- Interest in DevOps (Kubernetes, AWS)
career_tags: Phát Triển Phần Mềm Bằng Golang
